page.title: 15LIGHT INDUSTRY-BRAISHFIELD
page.content: At Abbotswood,S.W.of the area there is a small works site housing four firms. 1.JOHN BRYANT (ROMSEY) Head Office of seed & grain merchants.Employing 27. 2.MABEY HIRE Co.Plant hire to the constructin trade.Employing 9. 3.CONDER P.L.C.Stockyard for steel girders used countywide and for export Employing 9 on site. 4.BRICKLAP Makes specialist concrete bricks.Employing 3 on site. 5.COOPER CARPONENTS.at Crookhill. Mail Order specialist car parts. Husband & wife only. 6.CHAPEL WORKS Light Engineer-Restores vintage vehicles. Owner hobby only. 7.WESSEX IRONCRAFT at Hawkes Farm Forged Ironwork & Wheelwright,makes & repairs horse-drawn vehicles.Owner only.
